title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Tips
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/readme","text":" <$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-]] [get[version]] [[-red?style=social]] +[join[]]}}} /> <$button setTitle=<> setField="text" setTo="contents"> Contents <$button setTitle=<> setField="text" setTo="explore"> Explore !! Tiddlywiki Tips * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-tips]] * [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw]] !! 介绍 * 点击刷新随机文本, 默认自动刷新时间间隔为30s * 可以自己添加文本, 文本的class为.tw-tip, 可自定义 * 最小格式见下方 ```json [ { "id": "1", "from": "文本来源", "hitokoto": "文本" }, { "id": "2", "from": "sentences", "hitokoto": "It's a beautiful day." } ] ``` > id 是标记用的， 可选参数， hitokoto是必选参数, from可以留空 !! Example <$button> Click me <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/ui/modal"/> > 注： 本插件由neotw-hitokoto单独抽离而出, 此插件只是作为一个例子， 后续更新请查看neotw-hitokoto插件 !! 用法 ``` <$tw-tip /> ``` 在tiddler里面嵌入以上内容即可 > 如果需要添加大量文本， 建议使用chatgpt制卡(如果可以), 以下是本插件文本默认的制卡规则, 仅仅作为参考建议 * 英文名人名言 * 长度控制在20 到35 之间 * 不使用双引号 * 来源使用@分离 <$button> 添加文本 <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/random-sentences.json" /> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/config"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/random-sentences.json":{"text":"[{"id":"1","hitokoto":"The sunshine， having no alternative，on the nothing new.","from":"@《墨菲》 塞缪尔•贝克特"},{"id":"2","hitokoto":"It was a bright cold day in April，and the clocks were striking thirteen","from":"@《1984》 乔治·奥威尔"},{"id":"3","hitokoto":"The past is a foreign country： they do things differently there.","from":"@《一段情》 L•P•哈特利"},{"id":"4","hitokoto":"It was the day my grandmother exploded.","from":"@《乌鸦公路》伊恩•班克斯"},{"id":"5","hitokoto":"They say when trouble comes close ranks， and so the white people did","from":"@《藻海无边》 简·里斯"},{"id":"6","hitokoto":"All children， except one， grow up","from":"@《彼得·潘》 詹姆斯·马修·巴利"},{"id":"7","hitokoto":"There was no possibility of taking a walk that day.","from":"@《简•爱》 夏洛特•勃朗特"},{"id":"8","hitokoto":"Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.","from":"@Winston Churchill"},{"id":"9","hitokoto":"You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.","from":"@Wayne Gretzky"},{"id":"10","hitokoto":"If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.","from":"@Albert Einstein"},{"id":"11","hitokoto":"The only way to do great work is to love what you do.","from":"@Steve Jobs"},{"id":"12","hitokoto":"The best way to predict the future is to invent it.","from":"@Alan Kay"},{"id":"13","hitokoto":"Be the change you wish to see in the world.","from":"@Mahatma Gandhi"},{"id":"14","hitokoto":"The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.","from":"@Franklin D. Roosevelt"},{"id":"15","hitokoto":"If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.","from":"@Albert Einstein"},{"id":"16","hitokoto":"You must be the change you wish to see in the world.","from":"@Mahatma Gandhi"},{"id":"17","hitokoto":"Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.","from":"@Ralph Waldo Emerson"},{"id":"18","hitokoto":"I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed: 'We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men are created equal.'","from":"@Martin Luther King Jr."},{"id":"19","hitokoto":"Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.","from":"@Nelson Mandela"},{"id":"20","hitokoto":"It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.","from":"@Aristotle Onassis"},{"id":"21","hitokoto":"The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.","from":"@Socrates"},{"id":"22","hitokoto":"A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.","from":"@Albert Einstein"},{"id":"23","hitokoto":"If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.","from":"@Booker T. Washington"},{"id":"24","hitokoto":"The only way to do great work is to love what you do.","from":"@Steve Jobs"},{"id":"25","hitokoto":"Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.","from":"@Albert Einstein"},{"id":"26","hitokoto":"Believe you can and you're halfway there.","from":"@Theodore Roosevelt"},{"id":"27","hitokoto":"Change your thoughts and you change your world.","from":"@Norman Vincent Peale"},{"id":"28","hitokoto":"A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.","from":"@Lao Tzu"},{"id":"29","hitokoto":"Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.","from":"@Winston Churchill"},{"id":"30","hitokoto":"You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.","from":"@Wayne Gretzky"},{"id":"31","hitokoto":"The best way to predict the future is to invent it.","from":"@Alan Kay"},{"id":"32","hitokoto":"Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.","from":"@Albert Einstein"},{"id":"33","hitokoto":"Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.","from":"@Dalai Lama"},{"id":"34","hitokoto":"Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced.","from":"@James Baldwin"},{"id":"35","hitokoto":"The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.","from":"@Franklin D. Roosevelt"},{"id":"36","hitokoto":"I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.","from":"@Thomas Edison"},{"id":"37","hitokoto":"The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.","from":"@Nelson Mandela"},{"id":"38","hitokoto":"It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.","from":"@Confucius"},{"id":"39","hitokoto":"All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.","from":"@Walt Disney"},{"id":"40","hitokoto":"The secret of getting ahead is getting started.","from":"@Mark Twain"},{"id":"41","hitokoto":"If you want to make your dreams come true, the first thing you have to do is wake up.","from":"@J.M. Power"},{"id":"42","hitokoto":"Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.","from":"@Sam Levenson"},{"id":"43","hitokoto":"Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.","from":"@Will Rogers"},{"id":"44","hitokoto":"You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.","from":"@Henry Ford"},{"id":"45","hitokoto":"Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.","from":"@Charles R. Swindoll"},{"id":"46","hitokoto":"The best revenge is massive success.","from":"@Frank Sinatra"},{"id":"47","hitokoto":"I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.","from":"@Rosa Parks"},{"id":"48","hitokoto":"The only way to do good work is to love what you do.","from":"@Steve Jobs"},{"id":"49","hitokoto":"A year from now you may wish you had started today.","from":"@Karen Lamb"},{"id":"50","hitokoto":"The only time you fail is when you fall down and stay down.","from":"@Stephen Richards"},{"id":"51","hitokoto":"You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.","from":"@Zig Ziglar"},{"id":"52","hitokoto":"If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.","from":"@Maya Angelou"},{"id":"53","hitokoto":"The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.","from":"@Franklin D. Roosevelt"},{"id":"54","hitokoto":"The only way to have a good idea is to have a lot of ideas.","from":"@Linus Pauling"},{"id":"55","hitokoto":"You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.","from":"@C.S. Lewis"},{"id":"56","hitokoto":"The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.","from":"@Bruce Lee"},{"id":"57","hitokoto":"A true hero isn't measured by the size of his strength, but by the strength of his heart.","from":"@Hercules"},{"id":"58","hitokoto":"Life is too short to waste your time on people who don't respect, appreciate, and value you.","from":"@Roy T. Bennett"},{"id":"59","hitokoto":"Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.","from":"@George Addair"},{"id":"60","hitokoto":"Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.","from":"@Og Mandino"},{"id":"61","hitokoto":"The best way out is always through.","from":"@Robert Frost"},{"id":"62","hitokoto":"You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.","from":"@Rumi"},{"id":"63","hitokoto":"Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.","from":"@Henry Ford"},{"id":"64","hitokoto":"You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.","from":"@Bob Marley"},{"id":"65","hitokoto":"It's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.","from":"@Abraham Lincoln"},{"id":"66","hitokoto":"Success is not what you have, but who you are.","from":"@Bo Bennett"},{"id":"67","hitokoto":"The only source of knowledge is experience.","from":"@Albert Einstein"},{"id":"68","hitokoto":"Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.","from":"@Theodore Roosevelt"},{"id":"69","hitokoto":"If you're going through hell, keep going.","from":"@Winston Churchill"},{"id":"70","hitokoto":"The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.","from":"@Nelson Mandela"},{"id":"71","hitokoto":"Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!","from":"@Audrey Hepburn"},{"id":"72","hitokoto":"Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.","from":"@Albert Einstein"},{"id":"73","hitokoto":"Believe you can and you're halfway there.","from":"@Theodore Roosevelt"},{"id":"74","hitokoto":"Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.","from":"@Steve Jobs"},{"id":"75","hitokoto":"It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.","from":"@Confucius"},{"id":"76","hitokoto":"A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.","from":"@Albert Einstein"},{"id":"77","hitokoto":"The best way to predict your future is to create it.","from":"@Abraham Lincoln"},{"id":"78","hitokoto":"It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.","from":"@Epictetus"},{"id":"79","hitokoto":"Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.","from":"@Ralph Waldo Emerson"},{"id":"80","hitokoto":"There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.","from":"@Maya Angelou"},{"id":"81","hitokoto":"Be the change you want to see in the world.","from":"@Mahatma Gandhi"},{"id":"82","hitokoto":"In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.","from":"@Abraham Lincoln"},{"id":"83","hitokoto":"The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.","from":"@Amelia Earhart"},{"id":"84","hitokoto":"The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.","from":"@Nelson Mandela"},{"id":"85","hitokoto":"The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.","from":"@Edmund Burke"},{"id":"86","hitokoto":"The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.","from":"@Mark Twain"},{"id":"87","hitokoto":"We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.","from":"@Aristotle"},{"id":"88","hitokoto":"Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.","from":"@Winston Churchill"},{"id":"89","hitokoto":"If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.","from":"@Unknown"},{"id":"90","hitokoto":"Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.","from":"@Oscar Wilde"},{"id":"91","hitokoto":"Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.","from":"@Henry David Thoreau"},{"id":"92","hitokoto":"If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.","from":"@Jim Rohn"},{"id":"93","hitokoto":"Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.","from":"@Benjamin Spock"},{"id":"94","hitokoto":"Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.","from":"@John D. Rockefeller"},{"id":"95","hitokoto":"If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.","from":"@Albert Einstein"},{"id":"96","hitokoto":"Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.","from":"@Albert Einstein"},{"id":"97","hitokoto":"Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.","from":"@Will Rogers"},{"id":"98","hitokoto":"You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.","from":"@Wayne Gretzky"},{"id":"99","hitokoto":"If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.","from":"@Albert Einstein"}]","type":"application/json","title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/random-sentences.json"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/tw-tip.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/tw-tip.js","text":"(function () { if (!$tw.browser) return; const Widget = require('$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js').widget; // TODO add enableAutomaticRefresh param class TwTip extends Widget { constructor(parseTreeNode, options) { super(parseTreeNode, options); this.isUpdating = false; } render(parent, nextSibling) { this.parentDomNode = parent; this.computeAttributes(); this.execute(); const refreshTime = this.getAttribute('refreshTime', '30000'); if (refreshTime <= 0) { alert('refreshTime 值过小， 请设置一个合适的数字'); return; } const ohitokotoSpan = this.document.createElement('center'); ohitokotoSpan.className = 'tw-tip'; this.updateText(ohitokotoSpan); ohitokotoSpan.onclick = this.handleRefresh.bind(this); parent.insertBefore(ohitokotoSpan, nextSibling); this.domNodes.push(ohitokotoSpan); setInterval(() => this.updateText(ohitokotoSpan), refreshTime); } updateText(domNode) { if (this.isUpdating) { return; } const sentences = $tw.wiki.getTiddlerData( '$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/random-sentences.json', ); const randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * sentences.length); const randomSentence = sentences[randomIndex].hitokoto + ' @' + sentences[randomIndex].from; this.isUpdating = true; domNode.textContent = randomSentence; this.isUpdating = false; } handleRefresh() { if (this.isUpdating) { return; } const ohitokotoSpan = this.domNodes[0]; this.updateText(ohitokotoSpan); console.log('Refreshed: ' + ohitokotoSpan.textContent); } } exports['tw-tip'] = TwTip; })(); ","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"widget"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/explore":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/explore","text":"<$macrocall $name="tree" prefix={{{ [addsuffix[/]] }}}> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/icon","text":" ","type":"image/svg+xml"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/macro":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/macro","tags":"$:/tags/Macro"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/style":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/style","text":".tw-tip:hover { cursor: pointer; } ","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/ui/modal":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/ui/modal","mask-closable":"yes","class":"o-tm","subtitle":"{{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tips/icon}} Example","text":"> 点击下方红色文本刷新, 默认添加了99条文本, 由@chatgpt制卡
<$tw-tip />
"}}}
